mapper.select:
select tb.*, (select u.user_name from sys_user u where u.user_id=tb.create_user) as create_by_transformation, (select u.user_name from sys_user u where u.user_id=tb.update_user) as update_by_transformation from sys_meal tb where 1 = 1
and ( tb.meal_code like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{p.mealName}),'%') OR tb.meal_name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{p.mealName}),'%')
)
order by tb.create_time desc

select count(1) as totalCount from sys_meal tb where 1 = 1
and ( tb.meal_code like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{p.mealName}),'%') OR tb.meal_name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{p.mealName}),'%')
